business.pricing: Hourly/project rates with 1-hour minimum; verbal consultations $150-$300/hour; travel fees apply beyond 20 miles

content.about: Dana Summitt (Look Appraisal LLC) provides professional art appraisal services specializing in 20th Century Art, Contemporary American Paintings, Modern/Contemporary Prints, Photography, Rare Books, Vintage Clothing. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Based in Northwest Raleigh; serves Durham, Cary, and surrounding areas.

reviews.author: Karen J.
reviews.content: Provided an incredibly thorough appraisal of my art collection. Dana Summitt (Look Appraisal LLC)'s knowledge of the market is impressive.
